name: CATOLITE BLUE 502 R
description: CATOLITE BLUE 502 R is an organic pigment in powder form consisting of regular as well as equivalents as per International Standards having wider application such as paints, inks, plastic, textile, rubber industries etc.

Synonyms: (Phthalocyaninato)copper, (SP-4-1)-[29H,31H-Phthalocyaninato(2-)-κN29,κN30,κN31,κN32]copper, [29H ,31H-Phthalocyaninato(2-)-N29,N30,N31,N32]copper, [Phthalocyaninato(2-)]copper, Copper phthalocyanine, Copper phthalocyanine blue, Copper tetrabenzoporphyrazine, Copper β-phthalocyanine, Copper(2+) phthalocyanine, Cupric phthalocyanine, Cyanine Blue, Copper Chlorophthalocyanine
